amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, up to $2,000,000 for the "Care of Battlefield Wounds'.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3530 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3530 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S7380; text: CR S7380) To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, up to $2,000,000 for the "Care of Battlefield Wounds'.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3530 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3530 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Burns.
